mapper.select: SELECT '주짓수 배우기' type , B.ID id , B.MEM_ID memId , B.IDX idx , G.GROUP_NM groupNm , B.CTGR ctgr , V.VIDEO_TITLE title , V.VIDEO_ID contId , V.VIDEO_THUMB thumb , (${videoUrl} || B.CTGR) url FROM BOOK_GROUP G, BOOKMARK B, VIDEO V WHERE B.MEM_ID = #{memId} AND G.IDX = B.IDX(+) AND B.CTGR = V.VIDEO_ID UNION ALL SELECT '주짓수 배우기' type , B.ID id , B.MEM_ID memId , '9999' idx , '미분류' groupNm , B.CTGR ctgr , V.VIDEO_TITLE title , V.VIDEO_ID contId , V.VIDEO_THUMB thumb , (${videoUrl} || B.CTGR) url FROM BOOKMARK B, VIDEO V WHERE B.MEM_ID = #{memId} AND B.CTGR = V.VIDEO_ID AND B.IDX IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT '이벤트' type , B.ID id , B.MEM_ID memId , B.IDX idx , G.GROUP_NM groupNm , B.CTGR ctgr , E.EVENT_TITLE title , E.EVENT_ID contId , '' thumb , (case when INSTR(E.event_id,'SEN', 1) = 1 then ${seminarUrl} || B.CTGR when INSTR(E.event_id,'CHP', 1) = 1 then ${championshipUrl} || B.CTGR end ) url FROM BOOK_GROUP G, EVENT E, BOOKMARK B WHERE B.MEM_ID = #{memId} AND G.IDX = B.IDX(+) AND B.CTGR = E.EVENT_ID UNION ALL SELECT '이벤트' type , B.ID id , B.MEM_ID memId , '9999' idx , '미분류' groupNm , B.CTGR ctgr , E.EVENT_TITLE title , E.EVENT_ID contId , '' thumb , (case when INSTR(E.event_id,'SEN', 1) = 1 then '/jiutopia/seminarDetail.do?eventId=' || B.CTGR when INSTR(E.event_id,'CHP', 1) = 1 then '/jiutopia/championshipDetail.do?eventId=' || B.CTGR end ) url FROM EVENT E, BOOKMARK B WHERE B.MEM_ID = #{memId} AND B.CTGR = E.EVENT_ID AND B.IDX IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKMARK ( ID, MEM_ID, CTGR) VALUES ( TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'), #{memId}, #{ctgr})
